title: How to use Keychron function keys in Linux
description:
I've just bought a Keychron keyboard. The move from a classical membrane keyboard to a mechanical one is not being as straightforward as I thought, but I like that I don't have a numerical keypad anymore, which was taking up precious space on my desktop. I also think it makes way too much noise, for my taste, despite the brown switches (hey, not blue!), but it's also probably me typing too hard.

One thing I noticed is that the function keys weren't working as I would expect them: just have the regular function work when I press the key, and have the multimedia goodies, which I don't use much, jump in when the fn key is added to the mix. Looking around, I've found this github repository which provides a very simple solution for this.
